summary.span: 支持通过标记文本在 ASP.NET 网页中使用语言集成查询 (LINQ)，以从数据对象中检索和修改数据。

span.span: Enables the use of Language-Integrated Query (LINQ) in an ASP.NET Web page through markup text to retrieve and modify data from a data object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主题内容：In this topic: - [介绍Introduction](#introduction) - [操作顺序Order of Operations](#order_of_operations) - [数据排序Ordering Data](#ordering_data) - [数据分组Grouping Data](#grouping_data) - [数据修改Data Modifications](#data_modifications) - [在运行时计算值Evaluating Values at Run Time](#evaluating_value_at_run_time) - [使用存储过程Working with Stored Procedures](#working_with_stored_procedures) - [声明性语法Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## 介绍Introduction 语言集成查询（LINQ）是一种查询语法，它可定义一组查询运算符，使遍历、筛选和投影操作能够以声明性方式在任何中表示。基于网络的编程语言。Language-Integrated Query (LINQ) is a query syntax that defines a set of query operators that enable traversal, filter, and projection operations to be expressed in a declarative way in any .NET-based programming language. 数据对象可以是内存中的数据集合或表示来自数据库的数据的对象。The data object can be an in-memory data collection or an object that represents data from a database. 您可以检索或修改数据，而不必为每个操作都编写 SQL 命令。You can retrieve or modify the data without having to write SQL commands for each operation. 使用 控件，可以通过在标记文本中设置属性来在 ASP.NET 网页中使用 LINQ。The control enables you to use LINQ in an ASP.NET Web page by setting properties in markup text. 控件使用 LINQ to SQL 自动生成数据命令。The control uses LINQ to SQL to automatically generate the data commands. 有关 LINQ to SQL 的详细信息，请参阅[LINQ to SQL](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/73d13345-eece-471a-af40-4cc7a2f11655)。For more information about LINQ to SQL, see [LINQ to SQL](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/73d13345-eece-471a-af40-4cc7a2f11655). 从内存中数据集合中检索数据时，可以将 属性设置为包含数据集合的类。When you are retrieving data from an in-memory data collection, you set the property to the class that contains the data collection. 将 属性设置为返回数据集合的属性或字段。You set the property to the property or field that returns the data collection. 例如，你可能有一个名为 `Person` 的类，该类包含一个名为 `FavoriteCities` 的属性，该属性将返回字符串值的数组。For example, you might have a class named `Person` that contains a property named `FavoriteCities` that returns an array of string values. 在这种情况下，请将 属性设置为 `Person` 并将 属性设置为 `FavoriteCities`。In that case, you set the property to `Person` and set the property to `FavoriteCities`. 查询数据库时，必须首先创建表示该数据库及其表的实体类。When you are querying a database, you must first create entity classes that represent the database and its tables. 您可以使用 [!INCLUDE[vs_ordesigner_long](~/includes/vs-ordesigner-long-md.md)] 或 SqlMetal 实用程序来生成这些类。You can use the [!INCLUDE[vs_ordesigner_long](~/includes/vs-ordesigner-long-md.md)] or the SqlMetal.exe utility to generate these classes. 然后，将 属性设置为表示数据库的类，并将 属性设置为表示数据库表的属性。You then set the property to the class that represents the database and set the property to the property that represents the database table. ## 操作顺序Order of Operations 控件按以下顺序应用数据操作：The control applies data operations in the following order: 1. Where （指定要返回的数据记录）。Where (specify which data records to return). 2. 排序依据（排序）。Order By (sort). 3. 分组依据（对共享值的数据记录进行聚合）。Group By (aggregate data records that share values). 4. 排序依据（排序分组数据）。Order Groups By (sort grouped data). 5. 选择（指定要返回的字段或属性）。Select (specify which fields or properties to return). 6. 自动排序（按用户选择的属性对数据记录进行排序）。Auto-sort (sort data records by a property that the user has selected). 7. 自动页面（检索用户选择的一小部分数据记录）。Auto-page (retrieve a subset of data records that were selected by the user). 您可以向 属性添加条件以筛选从查询返回的数据记录。You can add conditions to the property to filter the data records that are returned from a query. 如果未设置 属性，则 控件将从数据对象中检索每个记录。If the property is not set, the control retrieves every record from the data object. ## 数据排序Ordering Data 使用 属性可以指定返回的数据的属性名称，以便进行排序。You use the property to specify the names of properties from the returned data to sort by. > [!NOTE] > 如果将 控件与 [!INCLUDE[ss2k](~/includes/ss2k-md.md)] 或 [!INCLUDE[ssEW](~/includes/ssew-md.md)] 一起使用，并且 属性设置为 `true`，则必须在 属性中提供一个值。When you use the control with [!INCLUDE[ss2k](~/includes/ss2k-md.md)] or [!INCLUDE[ssEW](~/includes/ssew-md.md)] and the property is set to `true`, you must provide a value in the property. 默认情况下， 属性为 `true`。By default, the property is `true`. 如果为 属性分配一个值，则还必须在查询中返回的属性列表中包含所有标识列。If you assign a value to the property, you must also include all identity columns in the list of properties that is returned in the query. ## 数据分组Grouping Data 使用 属性可以指定哪些属性用于合并具有相同值的数据记录。You use the property to specify which properties are used to consolidate data records that have the same values. 在对数据进行分组时，可以在 属性中包含 `Key` 和 `It`，它们是动态创建的属性。When you group data, you can include `Key` and `It`, which are dynamically created properties, in the property. `Key` 属性指的是用于对数据进行分组的属性中的值。The `Key` property refers to the values in the property or properties that were used to group the data. 例如，如果按名为 `Category`的属性分组，则 `Key` 属性将包含 `Category` 属性中的所有唯一值。For example, if you group by a property named `Category`, the `Key` property will contain all unique values in the `Category` property. `It` 属性指的是数据分组中的单个记录的集合。The `It` property refers to a collection of individual records in a grouping of data. 您可以循环访问 `It` 属性，以便检索在分组操作中合并的各个记录。You can iterate over the `It` property to retrieve the individual records that have been consolidated in the grouping operation. 例如，如果按名为 `Category`的属性分组，则 `It` 属性将包含在 `Category` 属性中共享公共值的所有单个记录。For example, if you group by a property named `Category`, the `It` property contains all the individual records that share a common value in the `Category` property. 使用 属性可指定用于对分组数据进行排序的属性。You use the property to specify the properties to use for sorting the grouped data. 当对数据进行分组时， 属性指定如何对分组数据中的单个记录进行排序。When you group data, the property specifies how the individual records within the grouped data are sorted. 默认情况下， 控件将从数据对象中检索所有属性的值。By default, the control retrieves values for all the properties from a data object. 如果要使用可用属性的子集，则可以使用 属性指定要返回的属性。You use the property to specify which properties to return if you want to work with a subset of available properties. 选择操作应用于 Where、Order By 和 Group By 操作之后。The Select operation is applied after the Where, Order By, and Group By operations. 因此，如果在 Select 子句中创建了别名，则该别名在其他子句中不可用。Therefore, if you create an aliased name in a Select clause, the alias is not available in the other clauses. ## 数据修改Data Modifications 您可以使用 、和 属性指定是否启用了数据修改。You can specify whether data modifications are enabled by using the , , and properties. 用于从 控件中修改数据的用户界面通常是通过数据绑定控件（如 控件）提供的。The user interface for modifying data from a control is typically provided through a data-bound control, such as a control. 除了将 、或 设置为 `true`以外，还需要满足以下条件才能启用自动数据修改：In addition to setting , , or to `true`, the following conditions are required to enable automatic data modifications: - 不能为 属性赋予值。The property cannot be assigned a value. - 不能为 属性赋予值。The property cannot be assigned a value. - 分配给 属性的类必须从 派生。The class that is assigned to the property must derive from . - 分配给 属性的属性必须从 派生。The property that is assigned to the property must derive from . 可以通过两种方式限制在数据绑定控件中显示哪些属性。You can restrict which properties are displayed in a data-bound control in two ways. 可以将 属性设置为部分属性，也可以通过添加 控件来定义数据绑定控件的字段。You can either set the property to a subset of properties, or you can define the fields for a data-bound control by adding controls. 但是，如果设置 属性，则表示不能启用自动更新、插入和删除操作。However, if you set the property, it means that automatic update, insert, and delete operations cannot be enabled. 如果要在使用可用属性的子集时启用自动数据修改，请不要设置 "" 属性。If you want to enable automatic data modifications while you work with a subset of available properties, do not set the property. 相反，从数据对象检索所有属性，并使用数据绑定控件来管理要显示的属性。Instead, retrieve all properties from the data object and manage which ones are displayed by using the data-bound control. 当使用 控件或 控件时，还必须将 或 属性设置为 `false`。When you use the control or the control, you must also set the or properties to `false`. 这会阻止数据绑定控件自动包含用于编辑和删除数据的按钮。This prevents the data-bound control from automatically including buttons for editing and deleting the data. 数据绑定控件中未显示的任何值都存储在视图状态中。Any values that are not displayed in the data-bound control are stored in view state. 当执行数据更新时，它们将以不更改的形式传递到数据源。They are passed unchanged to the data source when the data update is performed. ## 在运行时计算值Evaluating Values at Run Time 如果需要在运行时评估值以便对值进行排序、筛选或分组，则可以将参数添加到 、、或 集合。If you have to evaluate values at run time for ordering, filtering, or grouping values, you can add parameters to the , , , or collections. 如果要指定默认值，可将参数添加到 集合。If you want to specify default values, you can add parameters to the collection. 如果要在执行数据操作之前检查或修改值，您可以处理 、、或 事件。If you want to examine or modify values before the data operation is executed, you can handle the , , , or events. 您还可以处理这些事件，以便取消数据操作，或检查在基于用户输入设置数据类中的属性时发生的验证错误。You can also handle these events in order to cancel the data operation or to examine validation errors that occurred when you set properties in the data class based on user input. 若要在数据操作完成后检查值，请处理 、、或 事件。To examine values after the data operation has finished, handle the , , , or events. ## 使用存储过程Working with Stored Procedures 通过为 事件创建事件处理程序，使用 控件从存储过程中检索数据。You use the control to retrieve data from a stored procedure by creating an event handler for the event. 在事件处理程序中，您可以在表示存储过程的数据上下文类中调用方法，并将结果设置为 对象的 属性。In the event handler, you call the method in the data context class that represents the stored procedure and set the result to the property of the object. 如果要对数据启用自动更新、插入和删除操作，则从方法返回的类型必须与 属性中指定的类型相匹配。If you want to enable automatic update, insert, and delete operations for the data, the type that is returned from the method must match the type that is specified in the property. 有关创建数据上下文方法的详细信息，请参阅 [如何：创建映射到存储过程和函数的 DataContext 方法（O/R 设计器）](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e7ca32f1-50b3-48af-ad92-ceafd749296a)。For more information about creating data context methods, see [How to: Create DataContext methods mapped to stored procedures and functions (O/R Designer)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e7ca32f1-50b3-48af-ad92-ceafd749296a). ## remarks.format: ## Remarks 将 属性设置为 `true`时， 控件将从 集合中的参数动态创建 Where 子句。When you set the property to `true`, the control dynamically creates the Where clause from the parameters in the collection. 添加到 集合中的每个参数都必须将其 属性设置为与正在查询的数据对象中的属性匹配的值。Each parameter that you add to the collection must have its property set to a value that matches a property in the data object that is being queried. 自动生成的 Where 子句将检查 集合中指定的值是否等于数据对象中的匹配属性的值。The automatically generated Where clause will check whether the value specified in the collection equals the value of the matching property in the data object. 如果提供多个参数，则这些参数将与逻辑 `AND` 操作链接。If you provide more than one parameter, the parameters are linked with a logical `AND` operation. Where 子句中不包含包含 `null` 或空值的参数。Parameters that contain `null` or an empty value are not included in the Where clause. 自动生成的 子句只能测试相等性，只能通过 `AND` 操作来链接参数。The automatically generated clause can test only for equality and can link parameters only with the `AND` operation. 如果必须添加不测试相等性的条件，或者必须将参数与 `OR` 操作相关联，请不要将 属性设置为 `true`。Do not set the property to `true` if you have to add a condition that does not test for equality or if you have to relate parameters with the `OR` operation. 可以通过将 属性设置为 `false` 并在 集合中的每个参数的 属性中添加占位符，来完成这些任务。You can accomplish these tasks by setting the property to `false` and adding placeholders in the property for each parameter in the collection. 在 属性中，每个占位符名称前面加上 @ 符号。In the property, preface each placeholder name with the @ symbol. 如果 属性 `true`，则不设置 属性，因为分析器会动态创建 Where 子句。You do not set the property when the property is `true`, because the parser dynamically creates the Where clause. 如果 `true` 属性，并为 属性赋值，则 控件将引发异常。The control throws an exception if the property is `true` and the property is assigned values. ## Examples 下面的示例演示将 设置为 `true`的 控件。The following example shows a control with the set to `true`. 控件绑定到 控件，以显示从查询返回的数据。A control is bound to the control to display the data that is returned from the query. 其中包含了包含三个值的 控件。A control is included that is populated with three values. 参数包含在 集合中，其名称设置为与数据对象的属性之一匹配的 `Category,`。A parameter is included in the collection with the name set to `Category,` which matches one of the properties of the data object. 其 属性设置为 控件的 ID。Its property is set to the ID of the control. 控件会自动创建 属性，以根据用户从 控件中选择的值来筛选记录。The control automatically creates the property to filter records based on the value that the user selects from the control. 查询返回的记录的 `Category` 属性与用户从 控件中选择的值匹配。The query returns the records whose `Category` property matches the value that the user has selected from the control. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可以指定用于合并具有相同值的数据记录的属性。You use the property to specify which properties are used for consolidating data records that have the same values. 例如，如果将 属性设置为 `Name`，则具有相同 `Name` 属性值的查询中的所有记录将作为单个合并记录返回。For example, if you set the property to `Name`, all the records in the query that have the same `Name` property value are returned as a single consolidated record. 可以通过在 `new` 函数中包含所有属性，并使用逗号分隔每个属性，从而将多个属性分配给 属性。You can assign more than one property to the property by enclosing all the properties in the `new` function and separating each property by using a comma. 例如，若要按属性分组 `Name` 然后 `Category`，请将 属性设置为 "`new(Name, Category)`"。For example, to group by the properties `Name` and then `Category`, set the property to `new(Name, Category)`. 用于分组的属性中的值是通过名为 `Key`的生成属性返回的。The values in the property that are used for grouping are returned through a generated property named `Key`. 在 属性中包含 `Key` 属性以检索分组值。You include the `Key` property in the property to retrieve the grouped values. 可以通过使用 `As` 关键字将 `Key` 属性设置为别名，但不需要使用别名。You can set the `Key` property to an alias by using the `As` keyword, but you are not required to use an alias. 例如，你可以将 属性设置为名为 `Category`的属性。For example, you might set the property to a property named `Category`. 可以通过将 属性设置为 `new(Key As ProductCategory)`，从 `Category` 属性检索合并的值。You can retrieve the consolidated values from the `Category` property by setting the property to `new(Key As ProductCategory)`. 您可以通过在 属性中包含 `It` 属性，来访问分组中的单个记录。You can access the individual records in a grouping by including the `It` property in the property. `It` 属性包含共享分组属性中的值的记录的集合。The `It` property contains a collection of records that share a value in the grouped property. 您可以循环访问 `It` 属性以检索各个记录。You can iterate over the `It` property to retrieve the individual records. 属性通常与聚合方法一起使用。The property is often used with aggregation methods. 您可以使用以下聚合方法：You can use the following aggregate methods: - remarks.format: ## Remarks 处理 事件以便执行以下任务：Handle the event in order to perform the following tasks: - 修改数据检索的参数。Modify parameters for data retrieval. - 以编程方式生成查询。Generate the query programmatically. - 修改排序或分页的值。Modify the values for sorting or paging. - 执行自定义排序或分页。Perform custom sorting or paging. - 取消数据检索操作。Cancel the data-retrieval operation. 传递给此事件的事件处理程序的 对象包含数据检索操作的参数。The object that is passed to event handlers for this event contains the parameters for the data-retrieval operation. 您可以在执行查询之前修改 事件处理程序中的参数，也可以创建新的结果集并将其分配给 属性。You can modify the parameters in the event handler before the query executes, or you can create a new result set and assign that to the property. 在此事件的处理程序中实现自定义排序或分页的能力可能受到绑定到 的控件的限制。Your ability to implement custom sorting or paging in handlers for this event might be limited by the control that is bound to the . 例如，单击 控件的列标题时，控件将执行自动排序，这可能会重写在事件处理程序中建立的任何顺序。For example, when the column header of a control is clicked, the control performs automatic sorting which might override whatever order you establish in the event handler. 如果在 事件的事件处理程序中引发异常，则必须在该事件处理程序中处理异常。If an exception is thrown in an event handler for the event, you must handle the exception in that event handler. 异常将不会传递给 事件的事件处理程序（通过 对象的 属性）。The exception will not be passed to an event handler for the event (through the property of the object). 属性仅包含在 事件之后引发的异常。The property contains only the exceptions that are thrown after the event. ## Examples 下面的示例演示了 事件的事件处理程序。The following example shows an event handler for the event. 处理程序将创建一个查询，该查询从网页中的字符串值数组中检索值。The handler creates a query that retrieves values from an array of string values in the Web page. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs/cs/Default3.aspx.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs/vb/Default3.aspx.vb#3)] 下面的示例演示如何将 属性分配给从表示存储过程的方法返回的对象。The following example shows how to assign the property to the object that is returned from a method that represents a stored procedure. ```vb Protected Sub LinqDataSource_Selecting(ByVal sender As Object, _ ByVal e As LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs) Dim exampleContext As ExampleDataContext = New ExampleDataContext() e.Result = exampleContext.GetRegisteredCustomers() End Sub ``` ```csharp protected void LinqDataSource_Selecting(object sender, LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs e) { ExampleDataContext exampleContext = new ExampleDataContext(); e.Result = exampleContext.GetRegisteredCustomers(); } ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，当更新和删除操作已启用时， 控件将所有记录的原始值存储在视图状态中。By default, when update and delete operations have been enabled, the control stores the original values for all the records in view state. 控件存储所有主键的值，以及在 `Column` 特性中未标记为 `UpdateCheck.Never` 的所有属性。The control stores values for all primary keys and all properties not marked with `UpdateCheck.Never` in the `Column` attribute. 您可以在 [!INCLUDE[vs_ordesigner_short](~/includes/vs-ordesigner-short-md.md)]中设置 `Column` 特性的 `UpdateCheck` 属性。You set the `UpdateCheck` property of the `Column` attribute in the [!INCLUDE[vs_ordesigner_short](~/includes/vs-ordesigner-short-md.md)]. 在 LINQ to SQL 更新或删除数据之前，它会根据数据源中的当前值检查视图状态中的值。Before LINQ to SQL updates or deletes data, it checks the values in view state against the current values in the data source. 如果值不匹配，则数据源记录已更改。If the values do not match, the data source record has changed. 在这种情况下，LINQ to SQL 会引发异常，并且不会继续更新或删除操作。In that case, LINQ to SQL throws an exception and does not continue with the update or delete operation. 有关 LINQ to SQL 的详细信息，请参阅[LINQ to SQL](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/73d13345-eece-471a-af40-4cc7a2f11655)。For more information about LINQ to SQL, see [LINQ to SQL](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/73d13345-eece-471a-af40-4cc7a2f11655). 将原始值存储在视图状态中可能会导致页面大小不必要地变大，并且可能会向恶意用户公开敏感数据。Storing the original values in view state can cause the page size to become unnecessarily large and can expose sensitive data to a malicious user. 您可以通过将 属性设置为 `false`来禁用在视图状态中存储值。You can disable storing values in view state by setting the property to `false`. 如果执行此操作，则必须提供自己的方法来确保数据未更改。If you do this, you must provide your own way to make sure that the data has not changed. 如果将 属性设置为 `false`，则不会在数据绑定控件的视图状态中保留原始值。If you set the property to `false`, the original values are not persisted in view state for the data-bound control. 在这种情况下，LINQ to SQL 无法验证数据的完整性。In that case, LINQ to SQL cannot verify the integrity of the data. 即使数据源中的数据没有实际更改，LINQ to SQL 也会引发指示数据冲突的异常。LINQ to SQL will throw an exception that indicates a data conflict even if the data in the data source has not actually changed. 如果基础数据源包含更新期间自动更新的时间戳字段，则只能将该值存储在视图状态中。If the underlying data source contains a timestamp field that is automatically updated during an update, you can store only that value in view state. 在这种情况下，将实体类中的 timestamp 属性设置为 `IsVersion=true`，并将所有属性设置为 `UpdateCheck.Never`。In that case, the timestamp property in the entity class is set to `IsVersion=true` and all the properties are set to `UpdateCheck.Never`. 由于每次数据库中的数据发生更改时，数据库都会自动更新时间戳字段，因此，如果数据已更改，LINQ to SQL 将从该值确定。Because a timestamp field is automatically updated by the database every time that data in that record changes, LINQ to SQL determines from that value if data has changed. 这有助于减少视图状态的大小，并且不公开敏感数据。This helps reduce the size of view state, and no sensitive data is exposed. LINQ to SQL 将通过将视图状态中的时间戳值与数据库中的时间戳值进行比较来检查数据一致性。LINQ to SQL will check for data consistency by comparing the timestamp value in view state with the timestamp value in the database. 有关详细信息，请参见[演练：使用带有 LinqDataSource 控件的时间戳来检查数据完整性](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e7700162-4f05-4130-81f7-3be1361027fa)。For more information, see [Walkthrough: Using a Timestamp with the LinqDataSource Control to Check Data Integrity](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e7700162-4f05-4130-81f7-3be1361027fa).

## Remarks 处理 事件可验证要更新的对象，检查数据类中的数据验证错误，更改更新操作之前的值，或取消更新操作。Handle the event to validate the object to be updated, to examine data validation errors from the data class, to change a value before the update operation, or to cancel the update operation. 传递给事件处理程序的 对象包含原始对象和更新的对象。The object that is passed to event handlers contains both the original object and the updated object. 如果在更新操作过程中发生验证错误，则 对象将包含由数据类引发的验证异常。If a validation error occurs during the update operation, the object contains the validation exceptions that are thrown by the data class. 如果要更新的值与数据类中的属性的类型不匹配，则会发生验证错误，或者，如果未通过自定义验证检查，则会发生验证错误。A validation error occurs if a value to be updated does not match the type of the property in the data class, or if it does not pass a custom validation check. 在 事件的事件处理程序中，可以检索验证异常并采取适当的操作。In an event handler for the event, you can retrieve the validation exceptions and take appropriate action. 如果在 事件的事件处理程序中引发异常，则必须在该事件处理程序中处理异常。If an exception is thrown in an event handler for the event, you must handle the exception in that event handler. 异常将不会传递给 事件的事件处理程序（通过 对象的 属性）。The exception will not be passed to an event handler for the event (through the property of the object). 属性仅包含在 事件之后引发的异常。The property contains only the exceptions that are thrown after the event. ## Examples 下面的示例演示了 事件的事件处理程序。The following example shows an event handler for the event. 此代码比较 属性和 属性中的属性，以查看值是否已更改。The code compares properties from the property and the property to see whether a value has changed. 如果值已更改，则 属性的值将设置为 `true`。If the value has changed, a value of the property is set to `true`.
